title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 326 - Registration And Classifications Of Pesticides
content:

§ 326.2 - Restricted pesticides
§ 326.3 - Commercial permits, restrictions

§ 326.15 - Application requirements for all pesticide product registrations

§ 326.17 - Additional application requirements for new and amended pesticide product registrations for which a major change in labeling is proposed
§ 326.18 - Filing and acceptance of registration amendments
§ 326.19 - Minor registration amendments not requiring approval prior to sale or distribution
§ 326.20 - Additional application requirements for pesticide product registrations for supplemental distributor labels
§ 326.21 - Special local need registrations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 326

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 3-0301, 33-0303 [3][d]-[e], art. 5;Agriculture and Markets Law, art. 11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
